Detailed Description

The adjacency (weight) matrices used to define the network layout.

)
staticprotected

Pass the input through a sigmoid function with the given paramters. This function does not add noise to the output.

Parameters
vThe input population.
slopeThe slope of the sigmoid.
biasThe bias (l/r shift) of the sigmoid.
noiseThe additional noise

Variable Documentation

◆ sigmoid

void(* CentralComplex::sigmoid) (Eigen::Ref< Eigen::MatrixXd >, double, double, double)
protected

Abstraction of the sigmoid function to function pointer. We can know whether we want noise at construction and this pointer allows the class to determine which method to call, noiselessSigmoid or noisySigmoid, at construction to avoid checking for each call. NOTE: Noise is currently excluded in the constructor.
